HTML 1st WordPress theme for WordPress developers to build from..

Bootstrap Grid, Pico minimalist starter kit and Lineicons together in one WordPress theme.

Fast theme deployment and write pure HTML and CSS

[Download from source](https://www.fruitty.co.uk/fruitty.zip?version=803)
